about_the_game:
Serena ended up all alone in the middle of nowhere... in the dead of the night. She just wants to get home. But people keep getting in her way...

Story

Sometimes life gives you lemons, sometimes it sends a friendly face down your way. Serena finds a good friend by the side of the road and they decide to share stories of the past to pass the time. Come find out about Serena's old dirty little secrets.

Gameplay

You guide Serena's choices in this path, in what to share or not about her past. Find out together with her friend in what adventures and messes she was in when she was a bit younger. The path is divided into 3 brand new branches and a lot of additional renders, adding even more content to the base game.

Features

  • You can replay any path and decision you discovered by selecting it on the Roadmap in the Extras menu.
  • Visit the Gallery in the Extras menu to check out all the scenes you unlocked during your gameplay. Can you find them all?
  • The text speed and auto delay can be adjusted in the Settings menu.
  • Use the Skip/Auto button in-game to automatically advance the dialogue without clicking each time or hold down CTRL for the same effect.

Disclaimer
All digital characters depicted in this game are 18+

content_descriptors.notes:
This game involves the depiction of graphic sexual events. The sexual content includes straight and lesbian sex. If you are easily offended or of a delicate sensibility this game is not for you.

All digital characters depicted in this game are 18+

name: Midnight Ride - Storyteller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 2GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4 core Intel/AMD
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 4GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
